Automatic camera calibration tool
  • Docs »

Information¶

This tool contains different methods for automatic surveillance camera calibration.

The implemented are: OptInOpt, PlaneCalib and LandmarkCalib. These methods serves for camera calibration based on 2D-3D correspondences of some keypoints. Contrary to classical PnP solution 3D keypoints does not lie within common coordinate system. More information can be found in Usage or see proper papers.

Requirements¶

  • tensorflow (tensorflow-gpu)
  • opencv-python
  • scipy

Tensorflow version TF1 and TF2 are acceptable. Tested on the following installation:

absl-py==0.10.0
astor==0.8.1
